about_the_game:
Unleash your creativity and strategic prowess into the world of GunGunGo, where you build, customize, and battle your own scale mecha robot kits. Visit local hobby shops to find new kits and parts to craft with, each with specialized attributes and abilities that let you create a personalized mecha masterpiece. Unlock new parts through intense turn-based battles, where victory grants you fame, new licenses, and rare parts to build larger, better, faster and more formidable models.



Climb the ranks and test yourself in battle, and push your mech to its limits. Prove your worth on the battlefield and aim for the ultimate glory of competing in the World GunGunGo Cup. Will your robot rise to the occasion and dominate the competition? The choice is in your hands, pilot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Graphics: At least 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
